title: thuLasi vilva
sahitya:
tuLasi bilva mallikAdi jalaja suma pUjala gaikonavE

anupallavi

 jalajAsana sanakAdi karArcita jaladAbha sunAbha vibhAkara hrjjalEsha hariNAnka sugandha

caraNam

 uramuna mukhamuna shiramuna bhujamuna karamuna nEtramuna caraNa yugambuna 
karuNatO nenarutO paramAnandamutO niratamunu shrI tyAgarAu nirupAdhikuDai aricu
